channel.title: New Error

item.title: New Error
item.dc:creator: @Zoft1 Zoft™
item.description:
@Zoft1 wrote:

Using the following code:

if (isNearCoffin(absX, absY)) { for (Player p : PlayerHandler.players) { if (PlayerHandler.players[i] == null) continue; Client c = (Client) p; if(isZamorak() && !c.isSaradomin() && isInWarZone() || !c.isZamorak() && isSaradomin() && isInWarZone()) { CountDown = true; } } } else { CountDown = false; }

Which means, if Player A is Zamorak and Player B is Saradomin don’t start the timer, or vice versa. The problem is I’ll go in just as Zamorak (with no other players on) and the timer still won’t start. Help?

Read full topic
